thread.title: Twitter reacts as the Trojans take down the Utes 42-24
thread.title_full: Twitter reacts as the Trojans take down the Utes 42-24

author: Holli Joyce, KSL.com Contributor
title: Twitter reacts as the Trojans take down the Utes 42-24
text:
Holli Joyce, KSL.com Contributor | Posted Oct 24th, 2015 @ 10:54pm 
— It was bound to happen. No one ever stays undefeated in the Pac-12 Conference. 
USC (4-3, 2-2 Pac-12) brought Utah down to Earth after the Utes (6-1, 3-1) were on cloud nine since Week 1. 
The Trojans took an early lead, scoring a touchdown on their first drive of the game. The Utes responded with a 30-yard touchdown by Britain Covey. Quarterback Travis Wilson threw a beautiful pass to Covey to give the freshman receiver a career-long reception. 
— Andrew Fox (@FoxOnABox_) October 25, 2015 
— somehow juking multiple defenders — for 41 yards to the 2-yard line, where Utah scored on the next play with the help of receiver Bubba Poole. Covey's second touchdown of the night came late in the fourth quarter and was 66 yards long. 
pic.twitter.com/5WPJafwWB1 — Dr. Saturday (@YahooDrSaturday) October 25, 2015 — Avery Mills (@alynn422) October 25, 2015 — Barles Charkley (@Hookemcougs) October 25, 2015 
et the Travis Wilson that has directv and not cable pls — Shon (@redsoxunixgeek) October 25, 2015 
— such as a potential trip to the Rose Bowl. How the team reacts next week against Oregon State in a home Halloween bash will factor how the rest of the season unfolds. 
— Patrick Sheltra (@100ThingsUtah) October 25, 2015 #GoUtes — Peeve Fartle (@bartle21_56) October 25, 2015 —
